patterns: why are people talking about catan
responses: catan is a game where you get resources from your development and build them into more development through trade luck and fun. To win you have to acquire 10 victory points first

To set up catan build the outside trade ports then inside put in tiles. these tiles represent the resources those tiles give then give. place numbers to each of these tiles the numbers represent how many resources you will get from that tile we're closer the number is 7 the more likely it is to roll seven being the most likely. Because of this the seven has a special rule for the robber placed on the desert Square which does not produce anything can rob from someone taking a card from their hand. Then from the person who's going first place down settlements on Corners of the tiles that you think are valuable this goes from the first player into the last player. Afterwards this goes backwards so last player places to first player Your second placements will get you your resource cards for the game the start and then you start
